Uses of Class
net.oauth.OAuthMessage

Packages that use OAuthMessage
edu.jhu.pha.servlets.oauth Only for authentication. 
net.oauth Fundamental classes and algorithms for implementing OAuth. 
net.oauth.client Classes for implementing an OAuth Consumer; that is a client that requests access to protected resources. 
net.oauth.http Classes that integrate OAuth with HTTP. 
net.oauth.server Classes for implementing an OAuth Service Provider; that is a server that controls access to protected resources. 
net.oauth.signature Classes to compute and verify digital signatures.
